it.polito.computervision.actions

Class ActionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polito.computervision.actions.ActionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GestureListener

    public class ActionManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements GestureListener
    Singleton that acts as a dispatcher for Gesture events. Only one GestureListener can be bound to a specific Gesture at any time.
    Author:
    giovanni

      • bind

        public void bind(java.lang.String gestureName,
        GestureListener listener)
        Binds a GestureListener to a specific Gesture referenced by its unique name (i.e. Gesture#getName()). If a listener is already bound to this Gesture it will be overridden.
        Parameters:
        gestureName - The name of the Gesture to bind to.
        listener - The GestureListener to bind.

      • unbind

        public void unbind(java.lang.String gestureName)
        Unbinds the GestureListener bound to this Gesture.
        Parameters:
        gestureName - The name of the Gesture to unbind from.
